getinstructions.help: If you don't understand how to play the game, use this command and the bot will tell you what you need to do.

countpeople.brief: Counts the werewolves alive and the villagers alive
countpeople.help: Counts the werewolves who are alive and the villagers who are alive.

secretchannel.brief: Create a secret channel where you can invite people to
secretchannel.help: Make a secret channel so that you can say stuff to those you trust only.

startlynch.brief: Start a vote to kill someone.
startlynch.help: Start the voting process. The vote will close at night time automatically if the vote hasn't been closed yet.

startgame.help:
The parameters are numbers that represent the following roles:
werewolf, seer, bodyguard, cupid, necromancer, hunter, baker
To start a game with 2 werewolves, 1 seer, 1 bodyguard, and 1 hunter, you type in !startgame 2 1 1 0 0 1. Every number not included is assumed to be 0.

vote.brief: Cast a vote for the person
vote.help: Cast your vote for the person of your choosing.

showleading.brief: Shows you who is in the lead
showleading.help: Shows you who is in the lead.

showvote.brief: Shows you who everyone voted for.
showvote.help: Shows you who everyone voted for and how many votes everyone got

showscore.brief: Shows you how many people voted for each person.
showscore.help: Shows you how many people voted for each person.

lock.brief: Locks your vote so that you cannot change it.
lock.help: Locks your vote so that you cannot change it. If everyone locks their vote the vote will be over early.

unlock.help: Use this if you locked your vote and you want to change your mind.

investigate.help: In order to investigate, you must also say who you want to investigate after invoking the command. You will see if that person is a werewolf or not. You can only investigate once per day. The ability to investigate renews every morning.

shoot.brief: Shoot anyone of your choice before you die.
shoot.help: As you're now dying, you have the opportunity to kill someone. Just type this command along with the person's name and you'll be able to take someone down with you.

kill.brief: Kill someone of your choice. Only once per night.
kill.help: Because you're a werewolf, you get to kill someone every night as a team. Once someone uses this command, it can't be used until the beginning of the next night. Once nighttime is over, it's too late to kill someone.

protect.brief: Use this to protect someone from the werewolves.
protect.help: Protect anyone of your choice from the werewolves. Your ability renews every sunrise. Also remember, you can protect yourself, but you can't protect the same person twice in a row.

match.brief: Make two people fall in love
match.help: Make two people of your choice fall in love so strong that they'd rather die than live without their love. You only have two arrows, so don't mess up.

sendmessage.brief: Send a one word message to the masons.
sendmessage.help: Send a one word message to the masons who will work to listen to the message. They're still working on communing with the dead, so you may have to give them a hint. You can give one hint or message per night. The ability renews every sunset.

sendhint.brief: Send a hint about the last message to the masons.
sendhint.help: Send a hint to help the masons decipher the last message. You can give one hint or message per night. The ability renews every sunset.

search.brief: Searches for the person on the server

tickle.brief: Don't you think about doing this!
tickle.help: Seriously! Don't do it! You'll regret this!!!

gettime.brief: See what time night and day happens
gettime.description: See what time night and day happens as well as when I warn you of nighttime coming.
